channel.title: How do I add a donator crown to my client?
channel.description: Ok well I have the sprite added, I have the donator symbol in the sprites folder of my client, added the code to class30_sub2_sub1_sub1. What else do I have to add to my client to make a donator icon appear next to the donators name?

item.title: How do I add a donator crown to my client?

item.description:
@holidayscape wrote:

what do you add to class 30_sub2_sub1_sub1?
